title: Alex Jones
summary: Alexander Emerick Jones (born February 11, 1974)[1][2] is an American far-right[10] radio show host and highly prominent[lower-alpha 1] conspiracy theorist.[20] He hosts The Alex Jones Show from Austin, Texas, which the Genesis Communications Network syndicates[21] across the United States and online.[22] Jones's website, InfoWars, promotes conspiracy theories and fake news,[23][24][25] as do his other websites NewsWars and PrisonPlanet. Jones has provided a platform and support for white nationalists, as well as serving as an "entry point" to their ideology.[26][27][28][29]
